content: द्रावक [द्रु-ण्वुल्] {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Attracting, captivating. {@--2@} Solvent. {@--3@} Liquefying. --कः {@--1@} A flux used to assist the fusion of metals. {@--2@} The loadstone. {@--3@} Moon-stone. {@--4@} A thief. {@--5@} A sharp or clever man, wit, wag. {@--6@} A libertine, lecher. --क Wax.
